titles.title: Government Fleet Fuel Economy Act of 2007
A bill to require the Federal Government to purchase fuel efficient automobiles, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 1/4/2007--Introduced. Government Fleet Fuel Economy Act of 2007 - Amends provisions relating to standards for executive agency automobiles to require each passenger vehicle purchased, or leased for at least 60 consecutive days, by an executive agency after enactment of this Act to be as fuel efficient as possible.
